text: @CNN A COVID19 Hotspot! People are so stupid. The numbers in Texas already at an all time high, plus all Texans are supposed to be social distancing and wearing mask to slow the virus. I guess Pence is just as stupid as Trump the Chump. Stupidity is contagious in the oval office!
